summary: The client requested a plan for the first sprint, and the sprint planning architect (Mike) proposed SP-001: Core Setup, including high-priority stories US-006 (Basic Authentication and Role-Based Access) and US-008 (Supabase Backend Integration), emphasizing their foundational role for the MVP.

actions.task: Approve the proposed sprint plan or suggest tweaks, then say 'save sprint' or 'start execution'

backlog_deltas.title: Core Setup sprint including US-006 and US-008
